channel.title: External on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.title: Eclipse Lyo
item.description: The Eclipse Lyo project provides an SDK to help Java developers adopt OSLC specifications and build OSLC-compliant tools. Lyo Features OSLC4J SDK: Lyoâ€™s central component is the OSLC4J SDK (Software Development Kit) that helps build REST-based servers and clients, compliant with the OSLC standard. Lyo Designer: Lyo Designer is an Eclipse plugin that allows one to graphically model (1) the overall system architecture, (2) the information model of the RDF resources being shared, and (3) the individual services and operations of each Server in the system.
